description: A short description of the project.
long_description: A longer description of the project.
platforms: web, windows, mac, linux, ios, android, other

__prompts__.project_name: What is the name of the project or software?
__prompts__.project_repo_name: What is the name of the repository?
__prompts__.project_org: What CMS GitHub organization is it under?
__prompts__.description: Provide a short description of the software. It should be a single line containing a single sentence. Maximum 150 characters are allowed.
__prompts__.long_description: Provide longer description of the software, between 150 and 10000 chars. It is meant to provide an overview of the capabilities of the software for a potential user.
__prompts__.status: What is the status of the project?
__prompts__.license: What license is the project under?
__prompts__.usage_type: What is the usage type for this project? For more information on each option, visit github.com/DSACMS/gov-codejson
__prompts__.vcs: What version control system is used?
__prompts__.forks: How many forks does the repository have?
__prompts__.platforms: What platform does the software runs on? Separate items by commas.
__prompts__.categories: What categories best describes the project? Separate items by commas. List of categories here: https://yml.publiccode.tools/categories-list.html?highlight=categories
__prompts__.software_type: What type of software is the project?
__prompts__.languages: What programming language(s) is the software written in? Separate items by commas.
__prompts__.contract_number: What is the contractor number of the project?
__prompts__.tags: Provide a list of tags to describe the software for search. Separate items by commas.
__prompts__.contact_name: A point of contact is needed for the project. What is the name of the point of contact?
__prompts__.contact_email: What is email address of the point of contact?
__prompts__.feedback_mechanisms: What are methods a repository receives feedback from the community (e.g. URL to GitHub repository issues page, website, email)
__prompts__.localisation: Does the software support multiple spoken languages?
__prompts__.repository_type: What type of repository is this project?
__prompts__.user_input: Does the project accept user input? (e.g. allows user to query a database, allows login by users, upload files, etc.)
__prompts__.fisma_level: What FISMA level is this project classified as? Learn more: https://security.cms.gov/learn/federal-information-security-modernization-act-fisma#perform-system-risk-categorization
__prompts__.group: Which group at CMS is the project part of?
__prompts__.projects: What project is the repository associated with? Separate items by commas.
__prompts__.systems: What systems does the repository use or interface with? Separate items by commas.
__prompts__.upstream: What upstream dependencies does the repository use? Separate items by commas.
__prompts__.subset_in_healthcare: Which subset of healthcare does the project belong to?
